title: ALTER TABLE and ALTER VIEW commands: Enable drop operation when a row access policy is not set | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2023_07 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

The ALTER TABLE … DROP ALL ROW ACCESS POLICIES command and ALTER VIEW … DROP ALL
ROW ACCESS POLICIES command behave as follows:

For example, if a row access policy is not set on the table and you try to run an ALTER TABLE … DROP ALL ROW ACCESS POLICIES command,
